title: Jessie James Decker celebrates launch of new boot collection with JustFab at Nashville party
text:
She's a country music singer, TV reality star and a mom of three.

And on Thursday, Jessie James Decker celebrated the launch of her new collection of boots for e-commerce retailer JustFab.

The 31-year-old posed up a storm with her products at the event held in Nashville, Tennessee.

Latest venture: Jessie James Decker celebrated the launch of her new collection of boots for e-commerce retailer JustFab in Nashville, Tennessee, on Thursday

For the event, Decker wore a long-sleeved black and white stripy mini dress.

She paired it with pale pink and white stiletto-heeled ankle boots from her collection.

She left her long dark blonde hair loose under a wide-brimmed hat.

Out now: The country music singer, TV reality star and mom of three posed up a storm in front of a huge billboard showing her wearing tight black leather pants and a pair of her boots

Modeled her designs: Decker wore a long-sleeved black and white stripy mini dress which she paired with pale pink and white stiletto-heeled ankle boots from her collection

Decker recently explained to UsWeekly that she loves wearing boots which made her collaboration with JustFab the perfect opportunity.

'Boots have been a signature part of my look since the beginning,' she said.

'I was really inspired by all that’s going on in my life, being on tour, being a mom, being a wife and I wanted a collection that would reflect my life, but also be perfect for the everyday woman.'

Everday footwear: 'Every day is different for me, so I never know where life is going to take me. Boots make any outfit feel put together and fashionable,' she told UsWeekly recently

Decker described boots as the perfect addition to any ensemble.

'Every day is different for me, so I never know where life is going to take me. Boots make any outfit feel put together and fashionable,' she said.

The singer is married to former NFL pro Eric Decker and the couple are parents to daughter Vivianne, five, and sons Eric, four, and Forrest, one.

In addition to her boot collection, Decker also has a clothing line Kittenish and, she recently told Extra, she's working on new music and plans to drop an EP soon.
description: For the event, Decker wore a long-sleeved black and white stripy mini dress. She paired it with pale pink and white stiletto-heeled ankle boots from her collection.
